title: Effective Utilization Strategies for MOOC Instructional Design Elements

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of core competencies as a corporate training manager/leader
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for strengthening professional competencies in language fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain how MOOC design elements (content organization, interaction, assessment methods) influence learning outcomes.
Learners can analyze how structured and systematic instructional design affects learners' sense of control and perception of goal achievement.
Learners can develop instructional design plans incorporating interaction and structuring strategies when designing language education programs within organizations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
